itemDescription: Scottish international lawn and indoor bowler

wikipedia_page.main: Elizabeth Christie is a former Scottish international lawn and indoor bowler.She won a gold medal in the fours at the 1985 World Outdoor Bowls Championship in Melbourne with Frances Whyte, Sarah Gourlay and Annette Evans.

response: ||     Sarah Gourlay Elizabeth Christie Annette Evans  Frances Whyte
|1 || align="left"| Sarah Gourlay, Elizabeth Christie, Annette Evans & Frances Whyte   || 18 || 15 || 1 || 2 || 316

Evans won the Women's Scottish National Bowls Championships title in 1987 and subsequently won the singles at the British Isles Bowls Championships in 1988. Her biggest accomplishment was winning gold in the fours during the 1985 World Outdoor Bowls Championship with Sarah Gourlay, Elizabeth Christie and Frances Whyte .

* Elizabeth Christie (bowls), Scottish international lawn and indoor bowler
